channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nvidia stock soared 35,000% over the past decade — but it's not the only top chip stock for the future

item.title: Trump-appointed judge dismisses DOJ lawsuit against Maryland courts over deportations
item.description: A Trump-appointed judge dismissed the case against the Maryland judiciary over an order barring the government from deporting immigrants for at least ...

item.title: Congress investigating D.C. police crime data after manipulation allegations
item.description: Congress is investigating Washington, D.C., police crime data following allegations that the numbers were manipulated. CBS News' Jake Rosen has more d...

item.title: What's the mortgage interest rate forecast for fall 2025?
item.description: Homebuyers and owners looking to refinance are hoping for a mortgage rate drop this fall. Here's what to expect.

item.title: U.S. markets hold steady in early trading Trump says he fired Lisa Cook
item.description: U.S. markets are holding steady Tuesday morning after President Trump attempts to fire Fed official Lisa Cook.

item.title: Quit‑smoking ads are ending. A former smoker fears what comes next.
item.description: For 13 years, the CDC's "Tips" ads shared real stories and free quitline support. With funding ending, experts worry fewer people may quit.

item.title: Trump vows to impose furniture tariffs. What would that mean for prices?
item.description: A White House investigation of imported furniture will end within 50 days.

item.title: WATCH: Coldplay ‘kiss cam’ redeemed after couple’s proposal caught on camera
item.description: Coldplay's infamous "kiss cam" is getting its redemption after a man at U.K. concert used his time on the jumbotron to propose.

item.title: Here's what NOAA predicts for the weather this fall
item.description: The National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration released its latest fall outlook, predicting balmy and possibly hot conditions for much of the cou...

item.title: Judge tosses Trump lawsuit against Maryland judges over immigration order
item.description: A federal judge threw out the Trump administration's challenge to a standing order issued by a U.S. district court in Maryland.

item.title: After Trump and Congress spending cuts, public media stations wait on money for emergency alerts

item.title: Some FEMA staff call out Trump cuts in public letter of dissent
